description_for_human: Search and cite rare historical texts (alchemy, Hermeticism, Renaissance philosophy) with DOI-backed academic citations.
description_for_model: Search translated 15th-18th century Latin and German historical texts from Source Library. Returns passages with properly formatted academic citations including DOIs. Use for: finding primary sources on alchemy, Hermeticism, natural philosophy, Renaissance thought; getting quotes with inline citations, footnotes, and DOI URLs; researching historical concepts, people, and terminology. All translations preserve original language for scholarly verification.
